english.segment1: you're the one who give shelter. and you're the light that leads me home. you're the love that gave forever.. Lord you're all that I know
english.segment2: and all that I am..unto you I surrender... Lord there is none like you. and I know that I stand..in the arms of forever.. Lord there is none like you
english.segment4: with the world upon your shoulders... Lord you gave your life away. if the world I know was over... I know I'd have life in the price you paid
english.segment5: and I will stand..and I will worship you forever.. for all you are. and I will stand.. and all to you I will surrender.. I'll worship you forever
